title: Disconnection Crashes every 2 minutes
body:
For some reason, I can't play anything since every game just disconnects me every 2 minutes. And this means 'every game'. Including DOTA 2, Paladins and SMITE, but my internet connection is 100% fine. I've also tried to restart my computer and it still doesn't fix anything. I just can't find the problem, every online game is kicking me out for 'disconnecting'

:'(
